resources.string: I feel so lucky to have you as my friend. Hope your birthday is as special as you are.May all of your dreams come true. Thanks for being such a great friend. Happy birthday!
"Happy Birthday to my amazing, beautiful, and fabulous best friend"
"Like a fine wine we get better with age... or rather, we feel better about our age with lots of wine! Happy Birthday!"
"May your special day be sweet and spicy just like you, bestie!"
Hope , You Like It !!!! Click Here
